<link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;26e25feb.1501">   <title>E-learning Project </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;26e25feb.1501</link>   <description> My official time at EKC has now finished and I wanted to thank you all for your time and patience in letting me work with you. We are in a better position I hope with the Moodle upgrade, and with Mahara and Xerte arriving late but still offering huge improvements. Pro-portal will be worth the pain and we have brought e-learning design back into the hands of teachers who have increasing confidence in what they are doing.<br>The LRC situation remains unresolved which is dreadful. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-19T17:23:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;26e25feb.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;ab205307.1412">   <title>Moodle upgrade </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;ab205307.1412</link>   <description> Hi folks. Mich has upgraded Moodle over the weekend. She has also added Xerte and Mahara and I have asked her to add Hot Potatoes hosted version as well. Might not get that immediately. Lots to explore in Moodle. We will have separate news for Dover and Folkestone and Broadstairs as well as a group space. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-22T09:09:57+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;ab205307.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;e0178ad1.1412">   <title>Moodle upgrade </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;e0178ad1.1412</link>   <description> Barry has arranged for Mich Balazs to finally upgrade our Moodle. Each campus can have a separate theme and mixed front page content (some general things as well as local items. This follows a request in June and will be done over the weekend of 20th/21st. December. This will add some new features, and a whole new look. Moodle will also now automatically resize to work just as well on tablets and smartphones. Content, course structure and permissions will not be affected. There will be a new range of activities available that can be easily added. Andy will be able [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-05T16:13:16+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;e0178ad1.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;3de3d336.1411">   <title>seeing e-safety as Risk Management </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;3de3d336.1411</link>   <description> I have asked IT to remove the net barrier for all URL shorteners. (tiny url.com and bit.ly &lt;http://bit.ly/&gt; for example). The arguments I have given to IT is being referred to \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdmanagement\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd.<br><br>The following is that argument for removing the barriers and taking the risk. Never clear-cut of course but it can be used for similar requests as varieties of the following: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-04T09:59:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;3de3d336.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;f153c20b.1411">   <title>October Update. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;f153c20b.1411</link>   <description> Good morning All. Technically speaking I have now finished as at the end of October but I am hoping to spend up to two days each at Dover and Folkestone to support e-learning generally (meetings with TLFs etc?) and complete some staff training. The training and be a combination of Moodle beginners and Moodle masterclass as required. Happy to take suggestions for dates to do this. If time is a problem, I can run two half-days only. Dover and Folkestone have been so delayed with the e-learning provision I haven\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt been able to give the support intended. Happy to take [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-04T09:41:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;f153c20b.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;9191cb8d.1410">   <title>e-learning project update </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;9191cb8d.1410</link>   <description> Hi all.<br>My time at EKC will finish at the end of October, although there is a lot of unfinished business at both Dover and Folkestone so I have asked Andrew if I can cary the project over the contract in order to complete the task. I don’t think I can fit in everything I want to complete in the coming month. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-03T12:38:02+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;9191cb8d.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;24c084b9.1409">   <title>Mapping Portfolio details </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;24c084b9.1409</link>   <description> I have been chipping way at City & Guilds to get a good price for their Learning Assistant Mapping Portfolio. Because the Hadlow group want to use this as well, I have got them down to a price of 320 each. I will have details on Monday how this works so more to come. This may be a default portfolio with all the benefits that come with that, but if any teacher is using another kind with another Board and they are happy, I am not proposing they should change. The point is that a paper based portfolio is no [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-26T15:04:14+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;24c084b9.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;2a7f7bd3.1409">   <title>Planet eStream </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;2a7f7bd3.1409</link>   <description> Hi folks. I have shared details about eStream with Christine Rickets and agreed with her that we should think about it once the dust has settled on the huge problems currently facing the College, particularly at Dover and Fokestone. If yhou want to have a look at estream here are some links. Dover and Folkestone teachers are already familiar with this system. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-26T14:40:42+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;2a7f7bd3.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;312ac4d2.1409">   <title>EKC e-learning project </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;312ac4d2.1409</link>   <description> A quick update on where we are . Dover and Folkestone still don’t have access to Moodle and I haven’t been told when this is likely to happen. The critical person here is Lesley and she will be the first to log in to Moodle to create an account. I (or Ian) will give Lesley Admin rights and she can then add a teacher to each course, who can then add other teachers. Enrolment can start as soon as teachers are ready. It is a cascade, starting with Lesley<br>Broadstairs is also having some IT issues which will have an [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-12T16:16:20+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;312ac4d2.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;1110f7e4.1409">   <title>xtLearn Collection </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;1110f7e4.1409</link>   <description> Following the day’s training at Broadstairs on Thursday last, I thought you might like to see the Collection I made available. I want to mail this individually by way of follow up and reminder of what we covered.<br>The Collection is at tiny url.com/vlepedagogy. Until I manage to get the tiny url unblocked, the direct address is http://xtlearn.net/L/2546/3/BCDEFM<br>Details of the presentation in PDF plus other reading is there. I have also included details on tiny urls, QR codes and xtLearn collections for this interested. The Canterbury Cathedral tour and Obliquity are indirectly related issues concerning Obliquity as a means [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-02T22:22:14+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;1110f7e4.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;1f270f13.1408">   <title>e-learning project quick update </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;1f270f13.1408</link>   <description> Ultimately this community will be used to talk about developments from a pedagogical perspective but updates here can also be useful at this time of year!<br>We have stripped back the front Page and Natasha Hart will begin adding student news as she has it, including getting it from Dover and Folkestone. Fiona Minter will provide articles as well.<br>I have reworked the drop down bar to show courses for all three campuses. Ultimately I would prefer a ‘my course’ link which is much simpler, but that decision is a choice for curriculum directors when ready.<br>Dover and Folkestone staff [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-26T10:37:05+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;1f270f13.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;20c2f838.1408">   <title>Re: Moodle update </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;20c2f838.1408</link>   <description> Thanks Geoff<br>All sounds good, certainly as a start. As discussed now with Peter gone the drop down may become time intensive to update, so yes, I think we need to make the change.<br>Had a look at E-Stream and it would appear to be the best way to go. Initial set up expensive but future years seem much more reasonable. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-25T08:01:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Andrew Jeffrey</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;20c2f838.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;fe0855df.1408">   <title>Moodle update </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;fe0855df.1408</link>   <description> A quick update. Still not getting access to Dover and Folkestone teachers to add them to their Moodle courses that are ready to go on the Brodstairs Server. It isn’t a long job once it is there so watching and waiting. I am at Broadstairs tomorrow morning with Mich Balazs from WKC Tonbridge. We are looking at the frontage banners, and eStream video links for Dover and Folkestone.<br>The 6 boxes on the front page need altering to give a connection to the three campuses and the elections box needs replacing.<br>I am looking also at the ‘find my courses’ [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-21T09:47:01+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;fe0855df.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;51da471e.1408">   <title>Where we are with Moodle </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;51da471e.1408</link>   <description> A quick update on where we are with the VLE. I am getting reacquainted with the structure and have added bits and pieces as requests have come in.<br>Tasha Hart in Student support will be running the front page, drawing on student news etc from all three campuses. We will be changing the 6 box banner on the front page to include links to the three campuses. I am hoping to change the drop down ‘find my course’ link to a simpler ‘my courses’ so students won’t have to navigate each time to a course.<br>We have added Journals and [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-20T10:34:03+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;51da471e.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;58eec53c.1408">   <title>Re: Welcome to the East Kent Teachers List </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;58eec53c.1408</link>   <description> Hi all. Good to be on board.<br><br>*Geoff not sure if the settings are correct as replying wanted to just send the message to you, rather than the group?<br><br>Andy :-)<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: East Kent Colleges e-learning Group [mailto:EASTKENT-TEACHERS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Geoff Rebbeck<br>Sent: 15 August 2014 12:48<br>To: EASTKENT-TEACHERS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Welcome to the East Kent Teachers List [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-15T12:05:51+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Andrew Jeffrey</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;58eec53c.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;c614aaf.1408">   <title>Welcome to the East Kent Teachers List </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;c614aaf.1408</link>   <description> Here is the promised list to support our East Kent teachers. So far, Kim Neve and Andy Jeffreys are here along with Lesley Sadler from Dover/Folkestone.<br>This is for teachers only and we will use it to share thoughts etc. on e-learning development. To reply to this message, sends it to everyone in the community. The list is a jiscmail service and not an EKC one. We can invite others in as we go as required where we think anyone would want to take part in the discussion. It is not an open list and we certainly won’t add people [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-15T12:47:52+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Geoff Rebbeck</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EASTKENT-TEACHERS;c614aaf.1408</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
